document.full_text: diamond foods inc  will buy pringles from procter & gamble co  for $1.5 billion in stock, snagging a global brand that will more than triple the size of its snack foods business.
document.title: diamond foods buys pringles from p&g for $1.5 billion
lines_and_colors: diamond foods inc  will buy pringles from procter & gamble co  for $1.5 billion in stock, snagging a global brand that will more than triple the size of its snack foods business.
